messages.content: What is the purpose of ControlFlowUtils in ComfyUI?

ControlFlowUtils is a custom node pack for ComfyUI that enables flow control with advanced loops, conditional branching, logic operations and several other utilities to enhance your ComfyUI workflows.
What is the current version of ControlFlowUtils and what has been updated in this version?
The current version of ControlFlowUtils is v0.0.2. In this version, nodes are fully documented inside ComfyUI.
Where can the documentation for ControlFlowUtils be found?
The documentation for ControlFlowUtils will be added to the Github repository tomorrow.
Where can samples of workflows using ControlFlowUtils be found?
Samples of workflows using ControlFlowUtils can be found in the included 'Workflows' folder.
What is showcased in the clip demonstrating a sample workflow of ControlFlowUtils?
The clip of a sample workflow using ControlFlowUtils showcases utilizing cycles to achieve iterative generation with different models and image sizes.
What is demonstrated in the simpler demonstration of looping in ComfyUI using ControlFlowUtils?
The simpler demonstration of looping in ComfyUI using ControlFlowUtils shows how to preserve values across multiple queues with the nodes in this pack.
How can the RAM cleaning functionality of the Garbage Collector node in ControlFlowUtils be used?

To use the RAM cleaning functionality of the Garbage Collector node in ControlFlowUtils, place the exe from the repo https://github.com/IgorMundstein/WinMemoryCleaner into your ComfyUI main directory (currently Windows only).
